about_the_game:
Achaapur is taken hostage by a local gangster Gundam.

You are the only hope left.
You have special powers.
Each helmet has a unique super power.
Switch between different helmets to use those powers.

Gundam is a dangerous villain.
Fight against different goons of Gundam.

Do you have what it takes to be a Super Hero ?
Play Platformer Helmet and find out.
detailed_description:
Achaapur is taken hostage by a local gangster Gundam.

You are the only hope left.
You have special powers.
Each helmet has a unique super power.
Switch between different helmets to use those powers.

Gundam is a dangerous villain.
Fight against different goons of Gundam.

Do you have what it takes to be a Super Hero ?
Play Platformer Helmet and find out.

  • Processor: Any Processor, Game is not graphic intensive
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics are enough

short_description: Achaapur is taken hostage by a local gangster Gundam. You are the only hope left. Each helmet has a unique super power. Switch between different helmets to use those powers. Fight against different goons of Gundam. A Platformer game that has fights and platforming action.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
